entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unexpected PGO schema divergence in a method that's both instrumented and optimized #85799
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Allow System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshalling.NativeMarshalling on interfaces #85797
  • ComInterfaceGenerator generates cleanup stage for stateless marshalled parameters when it shouldn't #85795
  • System.Text.Json #85793
  • X64 - Too many methods JITted on startup for blank console application #85791
  • Local linux builds should not enable PGO by default #85785
  • Test Failure JIT/Regression/JitBlue/Runtime_84693/Runtime_84693/Runtime_84693.dll #2 #85782
  • [browser] Enable symbolicator on blazor builds #85779
    8.0.0
  • [browser] do native build when preserving native symbols #85778
    8.0.0
  • Segfault in CMiniMdTemplate<CMiniMdRW>::getSignatureOfMemberRef #85777
  • [browser] Cache identity per query string #85775
    8.0.0
  • [WASM] Blazor Application crashes after 15 minutes #85774
    8.0.0
  • Test failure ConsoleEncoding.TestEncoding #85772
  • [wasm] Wasm.Build.Tests - blazor run tests failing #85769
    8.0.0
  • How to accept a client certificate signed by an untrusted CA in .netcore 3.1 #85767
  • JIT: Invalid ldp optimization with locals #85765
  • Task.Delay consumes lot of CPU #85762
  • Regression: Internal error in ILCompiler #85760
  • .NET 6 Environment.OSVersion returns compatibility mode version #85758
  • [NETSDKE2E] [Regression]With .Net 8 Preview4, 'GC heap initialization failed with error 0x8007000E' on Linux Arm32 #85757
  • SPMI: Give specific context examples for tpdiff #85755
    Future
  • Test failure System.Net.Mail.Tests.LoggingTest.EventSource_EventsRaisedAsExpected #85754
  • SPMI: Native Linux-hosted throughput runs #85749
    Future
  • Test failure JIT/jit64/opt/cse/HugeArray1/HugeArray1.cmd #85747

Closed

  • Regressions in System.Memory.ReadOnlySpan.IndexOfString #85756
  • Convert To 'LibraryImport' with 'W' suffix creates invalid code #85578
    8.0.0
  • "You must download or install .NET" task dialog repeatedly doubles in size on 200% DPI systems #85571
    8.0.0
  • "Cross Platform Cryptography" article is out of date #80122
    8.0.0
  • The HttpClient hangs with GetProxyForUrl #75873
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: ArgumentOutOfRangeException.ThrowIfNegativeOrGreaterThanOrEqual #82930
  • Make dependency on lld optional during runtime build #84934
  • [NativeAOT] Optimize the access pattern to threadstatics. #84373
  • High base memory usage with .NET 7 #75049
    8.0.0
  • Test failure System.Net.Mail.Tests.SmtpClientTest.SendMailAsync_CanBeCanceled_CancellationToken #85751
  • Test failure System.Net.Mail.Tests.MailMessageTest.SendMailMessageTest #85752
  • Test failure System.Net.Mail.Tests.SmtpClientTest.TestGssapiAuthentication #85753
  • Assertion failed '!"SSA check failures"' during 'Build SSA representation' #85629
    8.0.0
  • Missing overrides in LoggingHttpMessageHandler and LoggingScopeHttpMessageHandler #85104
    Future
  • iOS/tvOS simulators ran out of trampolines of type 1 #85582
    8.0.0
  • Double precision seems wired when I try to call ToString("F19") for number with less then 19 digit #85700
  • [API Proposal]: Change `System.Numerics.IPowerFunctions` #85707
  • TimeZoneInfo.FindSystemTimeZoneById is slow on Linux when input is Windows TimeZone ID #85432
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2174100 #85802
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add IPC commands to enable and disable PerfMaps/JitDumps #85801
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Fix RVA field access in composite Crossgen2 build (#78723) #85800
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [Mono] Add mono hot reload support for updating parameter name #85796
    area-EnC-mono
  • [browser] prevent <DebuggerSupport> from disabling interp optimizations #85792
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • [mono][interp] Fix first arg offset computation for unoptimized newobj #85787
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [release/7.0-staging] [browser] fix job queue timespan calculation #85784
    Servicing-consider, needs-area-label
  • Share ILCompiler logic #85783
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [JIT] X64 - Centralize peephole optimization for removing redundant `mov` instructions #85780
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • PipeReader.CopyToAsync(Stream) should not perform zero-length writes #85768
    area-System.IO.Pipelines
  • [browser] Wasm SDK task tests #85764
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Unify boot config location #85763
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • The AllocationTick threshold is computed by a Poisson process with a 100 KB mean. #85750
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Skip FP registers processing if method don't have floating points use #85744
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Improve the performance of the type loader through various tweaks #85743
    area-crossgen2-coreclr

Merged

  • Remove a number of unneeded nullability suppressions. #85788
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Update path in the WBT README #85794
    area-Build-mono
  • Convert ComWrappers/API tests to XUnit-style #85790
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Don't add duplicate suffix in LibraryImport code fix. #85668
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Revert "SetThreadDpiAwareness for host error dialog" #85773
    area-Host, 8.0.0
  • Avoid using two-char search in IndexOfOrdinalIgnoreCase for 1-char values #85781
    area-System.Globalization, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0-staging] Make WindowsServiceLifetime gracefully stop #85656
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Hosting, 7.0.7
  • [release/6.0-staging] Make WindowsServiceLifetime gracefully stop #85661
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Hosting, 6.0.18
  • [wasm] WBT: Disable blazor test due to https://github.com/dotnet/runt… #85786
    arch-wasm, disabled-test, area-Build-mono
  • [NativeAOT] Simplifying access to thread static variables #84566
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Keep `this` alive across the native call for VTable-based source-generation #85723
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • Add GenericTypeParameterBuilder implementation and save a generic type into assembly. #85658
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Make dependency on lld optional #85667
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Sync shared code from aspnetcore #85748
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [mono][wasm] Make experimental-gshared-mrgctx really true on WASM AOT. #85770
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • JIT: properly scrub SSA from return address buffers #85746
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add mcs support for new FROZEN_ALLOC_ALLOWED jit flag #85745
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Allow forward sub to reorder trees throwing the same single exception #85647
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Missing overrides in LoggingHttpMessageHandler and LoggingScopeHttpMessageHandler #85143
    area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory, community-contribution
  • Annotate IHtmlString.ToHtmlString's return as nullable #85742
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [mono][tests] Increase number of nrgctx trampolines to 50000 #85759
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • Add negative test for creating instances of function pointers #85709
    area-System.Reflection
  • JIT: Refactor physical promotion in preparation of generalized assignment decomposition #85728
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable more ILLink tests in NativeAOT #85651
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Expose various floating-point intrinsics for Avx512F and Avx512DQ #85716
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, arch-avx512
  • Revert "[NativeAOT] Do not strip exported symbols from executables on Apple platforms (#85293)" #85601
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix TimeZoneInfo Perf #85615
    area-System.DateTime, 8.0.0
  • Fix GetNonGCHeapBounds #85702
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr

Updated

  • [RISC-V][GC] Use 128gb for regions_range on RISCV64 #84797
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Enable EVEX feature: embedded broadcast for Vector256.Add() in limited cases #84821
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Interface inheritance follow up #85117
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Add request metrics to System.Net.Http #85447
    area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix GCStress timeouts in JIT/jit64 #85040
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Templatize `enregisterLocalVars` in various methods of LSRA #85144
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Create a createdump static library for single-file dump generation #84864
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Enable Libraries R2R Testing in CI #83854
    area-Infrastructure
  • [release/6.0] Suppress clang-16 warnings (backport #81573) #84443
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • The ConstructorBuilder and MethodBuilder generated parameter should not have default value by default #84550
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, community-contribution
  • Run NativeAot tests on arm64 #82307
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Remove references to P/Invokes and DllImport from resource strings in ComInterfaceGenerator #85178
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • [mono][tasks] Extract EmitWasmBundle into generic EmitBundle task and enable bundling in mono self-contained library #84191
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Address Sanitizer support in CoreCLR #74623
    tenet-reliability, area-Infrastructure
  • Clean up dead code in illink targets #85741
    linkable-framework, needs-area-label
  • Move `ASG` rationalization to just after global morph #85494
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Servicing docs improvements #85731
    documentation, area-Infrastructure, needs-author-action
  • Use Roslyn Source Generator Testing SDK to test interop source generators #84867
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, test-enhancement, source-generator
  • Enable option to use the Windows ThreadPool #85373
    area-System.Threading
  • Rework JIT<->EE communication for struct promotion; add support for general recursive struct promotion #85569
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Release/6.0] Port EventCounters multi session support to 6.0 #84680
    Servicing-approved, breaking-change, area-Tracing-coreclr, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 6.0.18
  • Add Ubuntu 22.10 kinetic kudu RIDs for .NET 7 #84984
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Add Ubuntu 22.10 kinetic kudu RIDs for .NET 6 #84983
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • [release/6.0] Fix HTTTP/2 header decoder buffer allocation #85341
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http, needs-author-action, 6.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Port perfmap environment variable change to 7.0 #85072
    Servicing-approved, area-Tracing-coreclr, 7.0.7
  • [release/7.0] Fix HTTP/3 and HTTTP/2 header decoder buffer allocation #85337
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http, needs-author-action, 7.0.x
  • [Release/7.0] Port EventCounters multi session support to 7.0 #84679
    Servicing-approved, area-Tracing-coreclr, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 7.0.7
  • [release/7.0-staging] Add linker flags to add fixup data to PDBs (#58417) #84358
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Zip.Unix: don't hang when creating zip file from directory with named pipe. #85301
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Upgrade System.Reflection.Metadata version #85738
    area-R2RDump-coreclr
  • Avoid reporting frozen segments in GetGenerationBounds #85727
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Fix invalid "double.ToString" behavior with two section separators #85565
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [TEST] noop change to see if tests are passing #85694
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [draft][browser] loader #85730
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Share UTF8 converters between coreclr and mono #85558
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Bugfix/30024 problem with concurrency type descriptor getconverter #85156
    area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution
  • [wasm] PackedSimd, add floating point methods #85705
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Generalize assignment decomposition in physical promotion #85323
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [DRAFT] Enabling AOT wrappers for virtual delegates #85643
    NO-MERGE, area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [browser] Load appsettings to VFS #85520
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [mono][interp] Attempt to devirtualize call if we have type information about `this` #85528
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [Mono][RISC-V] emit mul inst instead of emulated mul #85445
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [MONO] Add JIT_CODE_DEBUG_INFO record functionality for Jitdump #85107
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, community-contribution
  • [JIT] Fix - Do not remove `CAST` nodes on assignment if the `LCL_VAR` is a parameter. #85734
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Wasm.Build.Tests - use the new sdk with templates #85498
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Build-mono
  • [browser][non-icu] `HybridGlobalization` indexing #85254
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • [JIT]: Inline TLS field access for GC type #85619
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Allow the user to control the MaxVectorTBitWidth and PreferredVectorBitWidth #85551
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-avx512
  • This fixes an issue with gradual decommit in scenarios where we have … #84975
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Address `TODO-FIELD`s and delete quirks #85735
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] Implements the CodeGen::genCodeForIncSaturate(). #85502
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Add message details for AmbiguousMatchException #84512
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
